summary: Adds a slightly shorter 1 handed version of the Volendrung.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a slightly shorter 1 handed version of the Volendrung.
It can be smithed at the skyforge using 5 ebony ingots, leather strips an a daedra heart.
Tempering requires 1 ebony ingot (and the perk Arcane smithing)

Feel free to upload images of this mod.
